name: mcp-agent-proxy
description: MCP proxy server that allows MCP clients to communicate with agent servers (Mastra, LangGraph, etc.)

scripts.build: tsup src/mcp-server.ts --format esm,cjs --out-dir dist --dts --clean && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/mcp-server.js > temp && mv temp dist/mcp-server.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/mcp-server.cjs > temp && mv temp dist/mcp-server.cjs
scripts.validate:quick: echo '🔨 Building...' && pnpm build && echo '✅ Build complete' && echo '🧪 Running tests...' && pnpm test && echo '✅ Tests complete' && echo '🔍 Checking lint...' && pnpm lint && echo '✅ Lint complete' && echo '💎 Checking format...' && pnpm format:check && echo '✅ Format complete'
scripts.validate:full: echo '🔨 Building...' && pnpm build && echo '✅ Build complete' && echo '🧪 Running unit tests...' && pnpm test && echo '✅ Unit tests complete' && echo '🔍 Checking lint...' && pnpm lint && echo '✅ Lint complete' && echo '💎 Checking format...' && pnpm format:check && echo '✅ Format complete' && echo '🧪 Running integration tests...' && pnpm test:integration && echo '✅ Integration tests complete'
scripts.validate:ci: pnpm validate:full && echo '📊 Generating coverage...' && pnpm test:coverage && echo '✅ Coverage complete' && echo '🧹 Checking for dead code...' && pnpm deadcode && echo '✅ Dead code check complete'

author: mashh-lab
